Welcome to my blog! This is a test post to see how this all works. I’m excited to share my thoughts and projects with you. Stay tuned for more content!

About Me âœ¨

Hiya, I’m Charlotte â€” a systems administrator at Southern Illinois University Edwardsville and a homelab enthusiast. I manage roughly 1000 devices across campus classrooms, labs, and conference rooms, handling everything from classroom tech deployment to maintaining Crestron control systems. When I’m not busy ensuring everything runs smoothly, I’m tinkering with my homelabâ€”a mix of old computers and a couple VPSes, and pushing the limits of how many virtual machines I can host. I also enjoy reading, playing D&D, and crocheting.
